appName: Storms and Legends: The Lost Pirate Ship
displayName: Storms and Legends: The Lost Pirate Ship
display_name: Storms and Legends: The Lost Pirate Ship
display_long_description:
**Disclaimer**: This title is currently in Early Access and will be continually updated with new features, environment changes, and more interactive elements. 


Step aboard a meticulously recreated, full-scale Age of Sail pirate ship in VR and lose yourself in an authentic ASMR voyage. Every creak of the timber, lapping of water against the hull, and distant murmur of the sea has been recorded and mixed to deliver unparalleled audio immersion. From the soft sway beneath your feet to the echoing hush of the captain’s quarters, realism is at the very heart of the experience.

Explore every inch of the richly detailed interior—from the quarterdeck to the hold—and discover that everything you see is there to be touched. Lend your fingers to hat brims, compass faces, weathered books, glass bottles and more; each object obeys realistic physics, inviting you to lift, spin, drop or examine as you please. And this is only the beginning—future updates will add new tools, trinkets, and interactive surprises to deepen your voyage through history.

Lose yourself in atmosphere, sound, and tactile discovery as you embark on an ever-evolving journey through the golden age of sail.
